caption.title: Sequence of the DVG clones from PB2 segment.
caption.p: Sequence of the DVG clones corresponding to PB2 segment from (A) M-IAV (clones 1 and 2) and F-IAV clinical isolates or (B) PA mut and PB2 mut recombinant viruses. Underlined sequences represent the primers used for sequencing. Grey boxes come from the 5′end of the PB2 segment fused to the yellow boxes that come from the 3′end.
Click here for additional data file.
